author: jih2nn
content:
This is because Lighthouse doesn't support [beacon event](https://github.com/ensi321/beacon-APIs/blob/focil/apis/eventstream/index.yaml#L156-L160) yet. The only difference dora-focil makes is IL display so you can just stick to original dora.

```
[dora] time="2025-03-14T16:31:05Z" level=warning msg="Error while subscribing beacon event stream http://172.16.0.13:4000/eth/v1/events?topics=block,head,finalized_checkpoint,inclusion_list: 400: {\"code\":400,\"message\":\"BAD_REQUEST: unable to parse query\",\"stacktraces\":[]}" client=1-geth-lighthouse service=cl-pool
```
